data.snippet: The Federal Trade Commission will not appeal a court decision to allow Meta to acquire a virtual reality fitness developer, ...
data.html:
Khan领导FTC拒绝上诉法院批准Meta收购VR公司

VR Washington Examiner on MSN

1h

The Federal Trade Commission will not appeal a court decision to allow Meta to acquire a virtual reality fitness developer, ... 原文链接
data.text: khan领导的ftc拒绝上诉法院批准meta收购vr公司，联邦贸易委员会将不会上诉法院允许meta收购虚拟现实健身开发商的决定。。。，虚拟现实
